name: A Baby Dino Run - Family Friendly Dinosaur Jumping Game
name_original: A Baby Dino Run - Family Friendly Dinosaur Jumping Game
description:
You're a cute little baby dino on a big adventure to explore the unknown world of Dinocropolous. Run, jump, and avoid several obstacles as you make your way around this strange new world.

FEATURES

- Cute, adorable baby dino characters.
- Everything unlocked. Nothing to buy!
- Original Soundtrack.
- Fun for the whole family! Even grandma will love this!
